text:
MobilityWare | Software Eng,Unity,QA,Producer,Data Analyst | Irvine, CA | Full-Time | Onsite | https://grnh.se/igxqje1

"Solitaire?! Really?" Yes – really! We have amazing people, which has earned us both 'Best Places To Work' in the OC (’15, ’16, and ’17) and a 4.6 rating on Glassdoor. And that’s before you consider that we have the 2nd most played mobile game in the world. Your contributions touch millions, every single day.

Unity Software Engineer - Card Games - Work on some of the most popular mobile card games.

Software Engineer - Game Labs - Build games from scratch for social networks (JS,HTML5,SDKs).

We are also in need of QA, Data Analysts, Producers, and more.
